dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Contributing to the Digital Health Evidence Base One of our field s biggest questions is What is the impact on health of digital implementations Join these experts who will present their evidence of impact and foster a discussion about the evidence based needs of our field today from family planning programs to utilizing the new mERA checklist to documenting evidence of what is impactful for frontline community health workers and to how mobile technologies and the IoMT can help prevent and treat non communicable diseases Presented by Annette E Ghee World Vision International
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T11:16:13Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 ghee_gdhf_mera_checklist_wv_toolkit_14dec16.pptx: 3674440 bytes, checksum: 7716b5aafd73bf96a187a66b72ad219f (MD5)
Using the mERA Checklist to Close Measurement Gaps: Refining World Vision's mHealth MAndE Toolkit
